section.p: A SOP Instance Observation contains the DICOM Service Object Pair (SOP) Instance information for referenced DICOM composite objects. The SOP Instance act class is used to reference both image and non-image DICOM instances. The text attribute contains the DICOM WADO reference.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DGIMG" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9250)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9242)
The @root contains an OID representing the DICOM SOP Instance UID
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:9246)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:9244), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.6.1 DCMUID)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9254, CONF:9255, CONF:9256)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to SOP Instance Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.8)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9257, CONF:9258, CONF:15935)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Purposeof Reference Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.9)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9260, CONF:9261, CONF:15936)
This entryRelationship SHALL be present if the referenced DICOM object is a multiframe object and the reference does not apply to all frames
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Referenced Frames Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.10)
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:9251)
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL NOT contain [0..0] low (CONF:9252)
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL NOT contain [0..0] high (CONF:9253)
code SHALL contain codeSystem 1.2.840.10008.2.6.1 DCMUID and @code is an OID for a valid SOP class name UID (CONF:9245)
text, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @mediaType="application/dicom" (CONF:9247)
The text, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] reference (CONF:9248)
text/reference SHALL contain a @value which contains a WADO reference as a URI (CONF:9249)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DGIMG" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9242)
The @root contains an OID representing the DICOM SOP Instance UID
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:9244), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.6.1 DCMUID)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:9246)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9250)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9254, CONF:9255, CONF:9256)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to SOP Instance Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.8)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9257, CONF:9258, CONF:15935)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Purposeof Reference Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.9)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9260, CONF:9261, CONF:15936)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Referenced Frames Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.10)
This entryRelationship SHALL be present if the referenced DICOM object is a multiframe object and the reference does not apply to all frames
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:9251)
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL NOT contain [0..0] low (CONF:9252)
The effectiveTime, if present, SHALL NOT contain [0..0] high (CONF:9253)
code SHALL contain codeSystem 1.2.840.10008.2.6.1 DCMUID and @code is an OID for a valid SOP class name UID (CONF:9245)
text, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @mediaType="application/dicom" (CONF:9247)
The text, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] reference (CONF:9248)
text/reference SHALL contain a @value which contains a WADO reference as a URI (CONF:9249)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="DGIMG" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.8"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="677828287"/> <code codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.6.1" codeSystemName="DCMUID"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.9"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1818596928"/> <code code="1215842866"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="ROIBND" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.10"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="997259223"/> <code code="121190" codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.16.4" codeSystemName="DCM" displayName="Referenced Frames"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.11"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="516724837"/> <code code="113036" codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.16.4" codeSystemName="DCM" displayName="Frames for Display"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
